name: HotPuzzle:Video
description: HotPuzzle: Video is a video jigsaw puzzle Unlike previous games, HotPuzzle: Video requires you to spell out dynamic videos, which is much more difficult. But they are all the most pure hot beauty videos.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: Intel Core 2 Due E6300 or AMD althon X2 5000+ Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA 7300GT or ATI X1600 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 or later Processor: Intel Core I5 4170 or AMD FX 6300 Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX760 or ATI R7 260X Storage: 1000 MB available space
